When you are emotionally stable or you are able to keep your emotions on check, NTR is nothing but child's play, really. Anyway, let's hope Ch.7 gets TL'd for completeness sake :)

The main gist of NTR isn't the realism of the story nor the circumstances involved but more like the emotions that are induced from it. People that read NTR resulting in the following two outcomes are generally these type of people: I) those that feel disgusted, angry, jealous, sad, hate, rage, etc, and all of those negative emotions, are typically people that are either holding a lot of negative feelings in their irl or those innocently enough that never faced situations which gave them these kinds of emotions; II) those that feel ecstatic, excitement, arousal, etc, and all of those hedonistic characteristics, are people that draw pleasure from others' demise, usually are just plain freaks or immature kids that think it's cool calling ppl 'vanillafags,' 'snowflakes,' etc, or your typical 'NTR justice warrior' (yep believe it or not, this shit exists).
